title: Lynda - Excel 2016: Charts in Depth
description:
Lynda - Excel 2016: Charts in Depth

FYI : This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

4h 36m Intermediate Feb 16, 2016 Updated Mar 01, 2016   | Uploaded in May 10, 2016 By 2boweb


Subject:  Business 
Software:  Excel Office Office 365 
Author:  Dennis Taylor 

Charts allow you to communicate information visually, in a way that's more impactful than raw data, and they happen to be one of the most powerful and easy-to-use features in Microsoft Excel. In Excel 2016, there are six brand-new chart types to learn. Let Dennis Taylor show you how to create different kinds of Excel charts, from column, bar, and line charts to exploded pies, and decide which type works best for your data. Learn how to fine-tune your chart's color and style; add titles, labels, and legends; insert shapes, pictures, and text boxes; and pull data from multiple sources. Plus, get an overview of the new chart types in Excel 2016: Treemap, Sunburst, Waterfall, Histogram, Pareto, and Box & Whisker.â€¨â€¨The training wraps up with lesson on changing data sources for charts and printing and sharing charts.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Identifying chart elements
	â€¢	Selecting the right chart type
	â€¢	Creating basic charts
	â€¢	Creating sparklines
	â€¢	Styling charts
	â€¢	Moving and resizing charts
	â€¢	Modifying axes
	â€¢	Adding labels and gridlines
	â€¢	Analyzing data with trendlines
	â€¢	Inserting pictures, shapes, and text boxes
	â€¢	Customizing column, bar, line, and pie charts
	â€¢	Creating Gantt charts and other specialized Excel charts
	â€¢	Changing data sources
	â€¢	Printing and sharing charts
